title: How to Make a Wire from a Plastic Bottle

steps.title: Cut a soda bottle into a spiral.
steps.content: Cut a soda bottle into a spiral. The width of the strip in the picture is about 4 mm (0.1575 in). [1]

steps.title: Sit and hold a hair dryer (or a heat gun) between both knees.
steps.content: Sit and hold a hair dryer (or a heat gun) between both knees. Heat the plastic strip and wind it around while pulling it with both hands. Note, polyethylene terephthalate [PET] plastic becomes soft by 70ºC (158ºF).

steps.title: Remove the strip from the hot air occasionally to allow it to cool down and fix the shape.
steps.content: Remove the strip from the hot air occasionally to allow it to cool down and fix the shape.

steps.title: Continue until as much of the plastic strip as you want has been twisted.
steps.content: Continue until as much of the plastic strip as you want has been twisted.
